title: Kemono No Kuni Ni Kou Taiguu De Manekareru: Mori De Tasuketa Shinjuu To Kemomimi Bishoujotachi Ni Mechakucha Dekiaisare Nagara Slow Life O Tanoshinderu
alternative_title: Muda da to Tsuihou Sareta [Kyuutei Juui], Kemono no Kuni ni Kou Taiguu de Manekareru ~Mori de Tasuketa Shinjuu to Kemomimi Bishoujo-tachi ni Mechakucha Dekiaisare Nagara Slow Life o Tanoshinderu~ ; Banished by the [Royal Court] After Being Told I Was Useless, I Got Invited to the Beast Country Promising Good Treatment: Enjoying a Slow Life While Being Doted on by the Divine Beast and the Animal-Eared Beauties I Saved in the Forest
status: Muda da to Tsuihou Sareta [Kyuutei Juui], Kemono no Kuni ni Kou Taiguu de Manekareru ~Mori de Tasuketa Shinjuu to Kemomimi Bishoujo-tachi ni Mechakucha Dekiaisare Nagara Slow Life o Tanoshinderu~ ; Banished by the [Royal Court] After Being Told I Was Useless, I Got Invited to the Beast Country Promising Good Treatment: Enjoying a Slow Life While Being Doted on by the Divine Beast and the Animal-Eared Beauties I Saved in the Forest
description:
Description :
        One day, veterinary doctor Zeke is suddenly fired by the king, leaving him with nowhere to go but at a loss. However, after helping a divine beast, he is invited to the beast kingdom with excellent treatment. 
After Zeke is banished, the kingdom begins to decline, but he begins living happily surrounded by cute animal-eared girls. 
From Let's Become a Novelist! comes the he long-awaited comic adaptation of the hugely popular harem slow life packed with fluffy and cute animal-eared girls!
(Source: Bookwalker)
